fields.message: Click here for help and example usage of the various modules

sub_fields.label: Show Overlay
sub_fields.name: bfb_show_overlay
sub_fields.instructions: Add a black overlay at 30% transparency to make the text more readable

choices.header-left: Align heading to left / Copy to right

choices.side-by-side: Side By Side (swipe to see more)

sub_fields.label: Padding around image
sub_fields.name: cb_image_padding
sub_fields.instructions: Select yes if your image is an icon/illustration, and no if your image is a photo

sub_fields.label: Show 'How We Deliver' Section
sub_fields.name: hwd_show_how_we_deliver_section
sub_fields.instructions: Check this box to display the How We Deliver section (you can edit the acutal content in the Site Config section)

sub_fields.label: Show Our Partners Section
sub_fields.name: op_show_our_partners_section
sub_fields.instructions: Check this box to display the Our Partners section (you can edit the logos in the Site Config section)

sub_fields.label: Show Our Clients Section
sub_fields.name: oc_show_our_clients_section
sub_fields.instructions: Check this box to display the Our Clients section (you can edit the logos in the Site Config section)

sub_fields.label: Show Testimonials Section
sub_fields.name: t_show_testimonials_section
sub_fields.instructions: Check this box to display the featured testimonials section (you can add/edit the actual testimonials in the Site Config section)

sub_fields.label: Show Job Vacancies Section
sub_fields.name: jv_show_job_vacancies_section
sub_fields.instructions: Check this box to display the Job Vacancies section (you can add/edit the actual job vacancies by editing the Careers page)

sub_fields.label: Show Latest Posts Section
sub_fields.name: lp_show_latest_posts
sub_fields.instructions: Check this box to display the Latest Posts section (This will display the three latest news posts)

sub_fields.label: Featured Case Studies
sub_fields.name: fcs_featured_case_studies
sub_fields.instructions: Add up to 3 featured case studies

sub_fields.label: Show Request a Demo Section
sub_fields.name: rd_show_request_demo
sub_fields.instructions: Check this box to display the "Request a demo" section (The form and intro copy can be edited in the Forms section)

sub_fields.label: Menu Items
sub_fields.name: stsm_menu_items
sub_fields.instructions: To find out which section numbers you need to link to, if you look to the left you will see that each section is numbered in order.
